title: Research: Developer Radio/TV Station Feature
details:
# Feature Concept: Automated Developer Radio/TV Station

## Vision
Create an ambient audio/video experience that delivers project updates, code news, music, and **actionable alerts** - like a personalized radio or TV station for developers. Can be published as a 24/7 YouTube Live stream.

---

## ğŸ“ Attribution & Licensing Best Practices

### The TASL Framework (Creative Commons Standard)
When attributing content, include these four elements:

| Element | Description | Example |
|---------|-------------|---------|
| **T**itle | Name of the work | "Ambient Coding Beats" |
| **A**uthor | Creator's name | by StreamBeats |
| **S**ource | Link to original | https://streambeats.com/track/123 |
| **L**icense | License type + link | CC BY 4.0 |

**Example Attribution:**
```
"Ambient Coding Beats" by StreamBeats (https://streambeats.com) 
Licensed under CC BY 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
```

### Attribution Placement by Media Type

| Content Type | Where to Attribute |
|--------------|-------------------|
| **Music in Stream** | Video description + periodic on-screen credits |
| **Background Music** | Credits section in description |
| **Images/Graphics** | Near the image or in footer |
| **Code/Libraries** | LICENSE file, README, or NOTICE file |
| **TTS Voice** | Mention provider in description |
| **AI-Generated** | Disclosure label + description note |

### Software License Attribution (SPDX)

For open source tools used in the project, use SPDX identifiers:

```
SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
```

Common licenses we may encounter:
| SPDX ID | License Name | Notes |
|---------|--------------|-------|
| `MIT` | MIT License | Permissive |
| `Apache-2.0` | Apache 2.0 | Permissive + patent grant |
| `GPL-3.0-only` | GNU GPL v3 | Copyleft |
| `LGPL-2.1-or-later` | GNU LGPL 2.1+ | Weak copyleft |
| `BSD-3-Clause` | BSD 3-Clause | Permissive |
| `CC-BY-4.0` | Creative Commons BY 4.0 | Attribution required |
| `CC0-1.0` | CC0 Public Domain | No restrictions |

### Audit Checklist (Monthly)

- [ ] Review all music tracks - licenses still valid?

- [ ] Verify attribution in stream description is current
- [ ] Update MUSIC_CREDITS.md with any new tracks
- [ ] Confirm AI disclosure is accurate
- [ ] Check for any license term changes from providers

## ğŸ“º YouTube Integration & APIs

### YouTube Data API v3
**Docs:** https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3

Key endpoints:
- `liveBroadcasts` - Create/manage live streams
- `liveStreams` - Configure stream settings
- `videos` - Upload pre-recorded content

### YouTube Live Streaming Requirements
- Verified account, no restrictions
- Enable in YouTube Studio (24hr wait first time)
- Stream key from YouTube Studio > Go Live
